fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 224.90 lakh crore compared with Rs 154.12 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 shed 88.75 points or 0.51% to settle at 17,303.95. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 1.04% to 14.02. Adani Enterprises, Reliance Industries (RIL) and Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
